name: calculator
description: Evaluate mathematical expressions. Supports basic arithmetic (+, -, *, /), exponents (** or ^), parentheses, and common math functions (sqrt, sin, cos, tan, log, abs, floor, ceil, round, min, max, pow, exp) and constants (PI, E).

expression.description: The mathematical expression to evaluate, e.g., '2 + 2' or 'sqrt(16) * 2'
